text: Morden is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Clem Morden, an Australian rules footballer * Daniel Morden, a Welsh writer * Jessica Morden, a British politician * Jim Morden, an Australian rules footballer * John Morden, 1st Baronet, an English merchant and philanthropist * Reid Morden, a Canadian public servant * Robert Morden, a British cartographer * Simon Morden, a British author * Walter Grant Morden, a Canadian politician * Wellington Jeffers Morden, a Canadian politician ==See also== * Morden (disambiguation)
title: Morden (surname)
